selections.name: Royal Flush Deo
selections.reason: Gets top driver James MacDonald. Qualifier was steady (2:01.1). Maps to sit a good trip from mid-pack.

selections.name: Overend
selections.reason: Won last time out in snow conditions. Rail draw ensures a ground-saving trip. Bob McClure driving.

selections.name: Green Grass Grows
selections.reason: Showed good closing kick last time to finish 3rd. Improving form.

danger_horse.name: Green Goose
danger_horse.reason: High speed rating in qualifier but trailing tier (Post 10) is a significant disadvantage.

selections.name: Crown Monarch
selections.reason: Massive class drop from NW6500 to NW2500. James MacDonald in the bike from the rail. Should control this.

selections.name: Like Chaos
selections.reason: Coming off a strong win in 1:55.3. Form is excellent, but Post 9 is the main hurdle.

selections.name: Buck Dancer
selections.reason: Consistent veteran who fits well at this level. Inside draw helps.

danger_horse.name: Donatover
danger_horse.reason: McNair driving; capable of leaving for position.

selections.name: Southwind Mac
selections.reason: Highest speed figure (104) in the field. Broke stride last time (x10) but dangerous if he stays flat for McNair.

selections.name: Charlie Cheeks
selections.reason: Consistent type. Finished 3rd last time. Safer play if the top choice falters.

selections.name: French Vodka
selections.reason: Solid 4th last time out. McClure driving gives him a shot.

danger_horse.name: Resolved Issues
danger_horse.reason: Tyler Borth driving; has shown flashes of ability.

selections.name: Chef
selections.reason: Knocking on the door with a 2nd place finish last time. Louis-Philippe Roy driving.

selections.name: Haka Timatanga
selections.reason: Good 2nd place effort last start. Inside post allows for a pocket trip.

selections.name: Volcanic
selections.reason: Speedy type but compromised by Post 9. Will need to blast out or find cover.

danger_horse.name: Crazin Party Boy
danger_horse.reason: Rail horse with Bob McClure; could sneak into the exotics.

selections.name: Chic Choc Rose
selections.reason: Won two starts back in 1:55.4. James MacDonald retains the drive. Top contender.

selections.name: Supersonic Hanover
selections.reason: Coming off a win in 1:58. Good form and draws well.

selections.name: Sunday Shoes
selections.reason: Consistent check-getter. Doug McNair driving.

danger_horse.name: Go Boom
danger_horse.reason: Rail draw and Billy Davis Jr; could improve.

selections.name: Kinnder Icecube
selections.reason: Won last time out in 1:59.2. Inside post helps repeat that effort.

selections.name: Tie Game
selections.reason: James MacDonald takes the lines. Scratched last time but fits well here.

selections.name: Zillennial
selections.reason: Scott Young driving. Has speed figures to compete if he overcomes the post.

danger_horse.name: Acrobatic
danger_horse.reason: Broke stride last time (x4). Risky but fast.

selections.name: Smiles For Miles
selections.reason: Highest recent speed rating (125). J.R. Plante driving. Should be closing hard.

selections.name: Belmont Blazer
selections.reason: Also has high speed figures (120) but stuck in trailing post 10. Needs racing luck.

selections.name: Makemealegend
selections.reason: Daryl Thiessen driving. Mid-pack draw allows for options.

danger_horse.name: Party It Up
danger_horse.reason: Trevor Henry driving from an inside post.

selections.name: All Gas No Brakes
selections.reason: Significant class drop from NW10750 to NW6000. Billy Davis Jr driving. The one to beat.

selections.name: Bella Cavalla
selections.reason: Consistent performer. Finished 4th last time against similar/better.

selections.name: Dahlquist Hanover
selections.reason: Has back class but draws outside. Use underneath.

danger_horse.name: Tactical Strike
danger_horse.reason: Scott Young driving; could wake up with the class relief.

selections.name: Pemberton
selections.reason: Class of the field. Drops from Open company to NW12500. Even from Post 9, he is superior.

selections.name: Veracruz
selections.reason: Won last time out. In peak form. The main danger to the favorite.

selections.name: Quebec Hanover
selections.reason: Louis-Philippe Roy driving. Solid 4th last time. Good exotic filler.

danger_horse.name: Ghostly Casper
danger_horse.reason: Rail horse with McNair. Can sit the pocket.

selections.name: Daffy Hanover
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last time. Consistent form. Travis Cullen driving.

selections.name: Crypto Hanover
selections.reason: Jody Jamieson driving. Won two starts back. Scratched last time but fits here.

selections.name: Pier Ho Emerald
selections.reason: Finished 3rd last time. Tyler Jones driving. Good post.

danger_horse.name: Greenleaf
danger_horse.reason: J.R. Plante driving; capable of an upset.
